name: A Curious Time Traveler
description:
"A Curious Time Traveler" is a very short text adventure game.

I made this game to show appreciation for all the support '' Goodbye Time traveler'' has been getting.

So this is basically just a small gift to everyone who supported the main game.

If you haven't played the main game yet  ''Goodbye Time Traveler'' then you can play it here for free  :

https://fouzi94.itch.io/goodbye-time-traveler

====================================================
